channel.title: [REQ] Reflection Cheat Client ----
channel.description:
[b]whats up whats up moparscape?[/b] just curious as to how I might go about getting some commands for the Reflection cheat client Ive tried simple commands ive made myself that send a fake packet. for instance sending the trade interface then sending the trade accept packet but alas, they never work :( might as well consult the pros.... :palm: :palm: :palm:
--edit* also if its possible. any way to make a command that thinks i'm clicking on an ore rock and my player interacts? or any object for that matter.
